scheme_name: Tuition Fees & Exam Fees to OBC students
criteria: Caste Certificate and Caste Validity mandatory
Applicant should be Domicile of Maharashtra State and Passed S.S.C from Maharashtra State only.
Applicant should not avail any other scholarship / stipend
An Indian national student, domicile of Maharashtra will be entitled for scholarship under the quota of Maharashtra only irrespective of his place of study.
Admission to the course should be through Common Entrance Test or obtained minimum 50% marks at qualifying examination.
The total annual income of family / guardian should not be more than 2.50 Lakh.
